pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Asymptotic Non-Parametric Test of Association // The Multivariate Asymptotic Non-parametric Test of Association (MANTA) enables non-parametric, asymptotic P-value computation for multivariate linear models. MANTA relies on the asymptotic null distribution of the PERMANOVA test statistic. P-values are computed using a highly accurate approximation of the corresponding cumulative distribution function. Garrido-Martn et al. (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.06.06.493041.
